Zebra.name: Zebra
Zebra.ability: when this enters play, put a Zebra from your deck into your hand
Zebra.attack: deal 1 damage to each of your opponent's consumers for every Zebra you have in play

Cow.name: Cow
Cow.ability: at the start of your turn heal 1 damage from each of your consumers for every Cow you have in play. you can't use this ability if you have only 1 Cow in play.
Cow.attack: deal 1 damage to each of your opponent's consumers for every Cow you have in play

ability: If you are in a tree environment, this animal stays with more 3 hp
